issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Unable to create distribution build with Indie plan.
It takes me to Plan page. It was working few day back and stopped today.
fields.summary: Unable to create distribution build with Indie plan
fields.environment:
Mac OS Catalina
Axway Appcelerator Studio, build: 5.1.4.201909061933

comments.body:
[~efrancis] We are aware of this issue. For now, we recommend using the CLI to package your application.
* Android - appc run -p android -T dist-playstore
* iOS App Store - appc run -p ios -T dist-appstore 
* iOS Adhoc - appc run -p ios -T dist-adhoc

Alternatively, you are able to use the Atom of VS Code extensions to package the application.

We’re currently working with the platform team to diagnose and fix this issue.
We’ve shipped and verified a fix for this to platform so this issue should now be resolved.
